description:
Manages an Azure Container Registry scope map.  Scope Maps are a preview feature only available in Premium SKU Container registries.

```hcl
resource "azurerm_resource_group" "example" {
  name     = "example-resource-group"
  location = "West Europe"
}

resource "azurerm_container_registry" "example" {
  name                     = "example-registry"
  resource_group_name      = azurerm_resource_group.example.name
  location                 = azurerm_resource_group.example.location
  sku                      = "Premium"
  admin_enabled            = false
  georeplication_locations = ["East US", "West Europe"]
}

resource "azurerm_container_registry_scope_map" "example" {
  name                    = "example-scope-map"
  container_registry_name = azurerm_container_registry.acr.name
  resource_group_name     = azurerm_resource_group.rg.name
  actions = [
    "repositories/repo1/content/read",
    "repositories/repo1/content/create"
  ]
}
```

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Actions.description: A list of actions to attach to the scope map (e.g. `repo/content/read`, `repo2/content/delete`).

ContainerRegistryName.description: The name of the Container Registry. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the scope map. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Container Registry token. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
